import React from 'react'; const About = () => { return (

About Me

I'm Kelvin Chacha, a professional System Architect and Full-Stack Developer with expertise in building secure, scalable, and maintainable systems. I specialize in creating robust architectures that can handle modern web-scale demands while maintaining security and performance.

System Architecture

Designing distributed systems, microservices architectures, and cloud-native solutions that scale efficiently and maintain high availability.

Security Focus

Implementing security-first approaches, from secure coding practices to infrastructure hardening and ethical hacking principles.

Core Philosophy

"Build systems that are not just functional, but resilient, secure, and scalable. Every line of code should contribute to maintainability and every architectural decision should enable future growth."

); }; export default About;
